title: Lust, Caution
writer: Eileen Chang (story), James Schamus (screenplay), Hui-Ling Wang (screenplay)
actors: Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Wei Tang, Joan Chen, Leehom Wang
plot: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.
languages: Mandarin, Japanese, English, Shanghainese, Hindi, Cantonese
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 24 wins & 51 nominations.
